# CodeMirror Vendor Versions

This project bundles CodeMirror runtime into:

- `src/SlideTeX.WebUI/assets/js/editor-adapter.js`

Pinned package versions used for the bundle:

- `codemirror@6.0.2`
- `@codemirror/legacy-modes@6.5.2`
- `rollup@4.57.1`
- `@rollup/plugin-node-resolve@16.0.3`

Build workspace (local only, not required at runtime):

- `.tmp/cm6-build`
